scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach -Apv -j unlimited run test
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -Apv -j unlimited run build
scripts.build:wasm:
wasm-pack build -s rating-tracker -d ../packages/wasm --release wasm && sed -E -i.bak 's/"module": "([A-Za-z0-9\-\.]+)",/"main": "\1",\
  "module": "\1",/g ; s/^}$/}\
/' packages/wasm/package.json && rm packages/wasm/package.json.bak
scripts.validate: conc "yarn workspaces foreach -Apv -j unlimited run typecheck" "yarn workspaces foreach -Apv -j unlimited run lint" -n "ﯤ," -p "{name}" -c #3178C6,#4B32C3
